EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Thursday Highlights 12-7-17
EmailTemplate.subject: Hear from HCSC, RedMonk, Accenture, Gartner, Mastercard, Comcast, The Home Depot, and more!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/speakers]]> See Titanium Sponsor Accenture on the Main Stage today!
Breakfast begins at 7:30am and lunch starts at 1:00pm. Come by Level 2 and don't go home hungry!
Sign-up <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> to stay updated on SpringOne Platform 2018!
Main stage recordings and announcements are available on-demand here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2017]]>.
SpringOne Platform on social media: #springone <[[http://info.pivotal.io/n0IY0pk02lAN0JU05x00Cgo]]>, @s1p <[[http://info.pivotal.io/qxJI0C05Nm0Aog02U0Yr00l]]>
Thank you, The SpringOne Platform Team
